title: Snapshots from a Black Hole & Other Oddities
description: "Snapshots from a Black Hole & Other Oddities" is the first collection of short speculative fiction by Writers of the Future winner and Clarion West graduate K.C. Ball. Edited by Cat Rambo, the book takes the reader on a journey visiting characters on the very edge of a black hole to cops hunting dinosaurs to orbiting trash collectors to dimension-jumping do-gooders. There's no bad piece in the collection and K.C.'s style hearkens back to old school SF.
author: K.C. Ball
